level.heading: DISSEMINATION OF WINNING NUMBERS INFORMATION (ยง 30-613)

level.text: The dissemination and publication of winning numbers by telephone or in the media is for informational purposes only, and the Agency shall not pay a prize based upon information obtained from the LOT LINE or any source other than the official draw results electronically recorded in the central computer system.

level.heading: HISTORICAL NOTE
level.text: Prior to October 2, 1992, the D.C. Lottery and Charitable Games Control Board published Final Rulemaking at 29 DCR 2202, 2211 (May 28, 1982).
